title: Sales & Marketing Manager - Louisiana - Sports Equipment
text: Marketing Management & Program Planning. Membership Sales. Vendor Management, Media Placement & Production   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
